Italy: Kitos War: Roman forces captured the rebel stronghold of Lod and executed many of its inhabitants. Trajan died. The Senate accepted the general Hadrian as ruler of Rome, following the appearance of documents indicating he had been adopted by Trajan. Osroes I deposed his son Parthamaspates of Parthia and replaced him as shah of Parthia.
Malta: Malta becomes a municipium during the reign of Hadrian. (to 138)
